name: DataView.setBigInt64
description: The setBigInt64() method stores a signed 64-bit integer (long long) value at the specified byte offset from the start of the DataView.

refs.name: ECMAScript (ECMA-262)
refs.description: The definition of 'DataView.prototype.setBigInt64()' in the 'ECMAScript (ECMA-262)' specification.
